root.name: World League Soccer
root.description: OverviewWorld League Soccer ("Pro Soccer" in Japan) is a top-down soccer game for the SNES and Super Famicom. The game is actually a modified port of Dino Dini's Kick Off 2, an Amiga soccer game from the UK. World League Soccer's title screen credits Dino Dini.The player has several options for customizing their team, which can be selected from 24 international sides (which includes "Rumania" and "Columbia"). They can also select between four pitches to play on. In Japan, the game was also released for the Sharp X68000 under the title Pro Soccer 68.
